name: Critter Sitter
description:
You’re a babysitter for monsters. Except…you have a ton of monsters all at once. And more just keep coming! They all have their quirks and unique behaviors that you’ll need to learn in order to keep your daycare running.

This game was made solo for Ludum Dare 40 given the theme: "the more you have, the worse it is". I spent a little longer than the 48 hours allowed, and will continue to work on it!
